title: Regional Performance Leader
description: The North region generates $892,655.61 in revenue, which is 27.2% above the average region performance.
recommendation: Consider expanding marketing efforts or inventory allocation in the North region.

title: Category Dominance
recommendation: Maintain strong inventory levels for Electronics products and consider expanding this category.

title: High-Value Customer Segment
description: Customers aged 65+ have the highest average spending at $3,924.63 per customer.
recommendation: Develop targeted marketing campaigns for the 65+ age group to maximize revenue.

title: Inventory Risk Alert
description: 44 products are at or below reorder levels, with Beauty being the most affected category.
recommendation: Immediate reordering required for critical stock items to prevent stockouts.

title: Customer Retention Concern
description: Customer churn rate is 73.5%, indicating potential retention issues.
recommendation: Implement customer retention programs and analyze reasons for customer inactivity.
